name: Maukatua wind lines
description:
Gale force winds whipped up and over the Southern Alps of Te Waipounamu creating these ethereal clouds. We sat in a campground – after a night disturbed by the pop-top roof of a friend's van trying to take flight and tents being blown away – and watched the waves and vortices, eddies and whorls, form and dissipate.

This work was created by processing frames from a timelapse through creative coding tools – specifically vpype flow imager – to produce the flow field lines. Wouldn't it be amazing to be able to see the wind?

Aoraki/Mt Cook National Park, Aotearoa 🇳🇿
Captured Apr 6 2021 
Processed Jan 5 2022

1920x1080px 25fps MP4

jimmykl.tez
